channel.title: Being sorcerer sucks
channel.description:
Literally sitting around waiting to die.
Can't do anything to Inquisitor, easily outed by king, killing powers weak....
Inquisitor needs to be immune to death EXCEPT by sorcerer's circle of death, which kills inq even when direct target

item.title: Being sorcerer sucks
item.dc:creator: bbiaglla
item.description:
Inquisitors are really easy to play and win. There wasn’t much thought into this and it seems reactionary to the reaper possessor suck claims.

Let.the sorc make the inq look like unseen or cult with unlimited uses. His win condition shouldn’t be kill all BD. Should be kill all BD magic users.

item.description:
I’ve never seen one lose.

Every time one has almost been executed, they just declare what they are, get pardoned and then the sorc eventually dies.

item.title: Being sorcerer sucks
item.dc:creator: Michael_Watters
item.description:
as i have suggested, even inquisitor being death immune to everyone but sorcerer would solve this problem.
edit:
this would effectively stop inquisitors claiming d1, as an outed inquisitor would be targeted by a sorcerer immediately, though hunters could be meta and claim inquisitor and kill sorcerer but some sacrifices need to be made
